跮字的基本解释

跮
dié
〔跮踱（
〔跮跮〕忽然后退的样子。
du?）〕走路忽前忽后的样子。

跮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chì］
［《廣韻》丑利切，去至，徹。］
［《廣韻》丑栗切，入質，徹。］
(1)走路时忽进忽退。参见“跮踱”。
(2)走路不稳的样子。

跮字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【足字部】　跮； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1225第20
【廣韻】丑利切【集韻】丑二切，?音杘。【玉篇】跮踱，乍前乍卻。【史記·司馬相如傳】跮踱輵容以委麗兮。【註】張揖曰：跮踱，疾行互前卻也。　又【類篇】一曰忿戾。　又【廣韻】丑栗切【集韻】敕栗切，?音抶。躌也。　又【集韻】徒結切，音耊。義同。躌字原从足从無作。

跮字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
跮字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Slap
dié
〔跮踱(
[跮跮] Suddenly and then back.
du?)] Walking before and after.
Slap
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chì］
["Guangyun" is ugly and sharp, going to the end, thorough. ]
["Guangyun" ugly chestnut cut, into the quality, thorough. ]
(1) Suddenly advance and retreat when walking. See "walking".
(2) The appearance of unsteady walking.
Slap
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Unitary Collection] [Foot Character Department] 　跮; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 1225 No. 20
[Guang Yun] Chou Liqie [Ji Yun] Ugly two cuts,? Yinzhan. 【Jade articles】Stay awkwardly, but at first glance. [Historical Records·Sima Xiangru Biography] You can walk around and be beautiful. [Note] Zhang Yi said: stumbling, walking forward quickly.　[Classes] Again, I said that I was anxious.　[Guangyun] Ugly Liqie [Jiyun] Ugly Liqie,? Sound 抶. Chen Ye.　[Jiyun] The knot is cut, and the sound is faint. The same meaning. The word 躌 was originally written from the foot.
